animeTitle: One: Kagayaku Kisetsu e - True Stories
animeDescription: In 1998 winter, another world happens to come to existence in me, though I used to be a normal student. It is covering my ordinary life as the snow covers the ground. Until then, I haven't noticed, what has stayed unchanged in my daily life, the familiar scenes that have always been there, the warmth of the person whom I haven't noticed that I love her.   They have existed to bind me in this world in order not to let me leave.   It is the moment when I begin look for the bind and the significant person, for the first time. The time goes, and the sun gradually begins to shine the season. I wonder where I will be, and who will grip my hand.
animeCharacters: ['Nagamori, Mizuka', 'Kawana, Misaki', 'Satomura, Akane', 'Kouzuki, Mio', 'Nanase, Rumi', 'Shiina, Mayu']
animeStaff: [['Hinoue Itaru', ['Original Character Design']], ['Hisaya Naoki', ['Original Creator']], ['Katsumata Geki', ['Art Director']]]
